text: wede’inezīya wede nefek’uti ālayehimini? kemets’iḥāfu sewochi wisit’i le’inezīya lekaduti wenidimochachewi (ke’āgeri) «bitibareru ābirenachihu iniwet’aleni፡፡ be’inanitemi (gudayi) ānidinimi befits’umi ānitazezimi፡፡ bitigedilumi be’irigit’i iniredachiḫwaleni» yilwachewali፡፡ ālahimi inerisu wishetamochi meẖonachewini yimesekirali፡፡
